content:
Medications working group is beginning ballot resolution in the regular call 1pm AEDT today.
Join from PC, Mac, Linux, iOS or Android: https://zoom.us/j/8838248492
or Phone: +61 (0) 2 8015 2088, Meeting ID: 883 824 8492
International numbers available: https://zoom.us/zoomconference?m=tiJBLgpQ1Jwgz8W6fYSFjBfO0TXzS_yE

We'll work from top as these are in rough priority and negative vote order. All of the triaged medications WG related issues are listed in the meeting note.
https://confluence.hl7australia.com/display/MED/MED20181212+Meeting
If you raised the issues listed or have some interest in the outcome you may wish to attend and you are most welcome. It is likely multiple sessions will be required to complete this ballot resolution - timing of these sessions will be discussed on this call.

Medications working group is continuing ballot resolution in the regular call 1pm AEDT today (NOW!)
Join from PC, Mac, Linux, iOS or Android: https://zoom.us/j/8838248492
or Phone: +61 (0) 2 8015 2088, Meeting ID: 883 824 8492
International numbers available: https://zoom.us/zoomconference?m=tiJBLgpQ1Jwgz8W6fYSFjBfO0TXzS_yE

Hi - I will need to cancel the call scheduled for tomorrow 6th Feb 2019 due to other commitments.
I will need to send out a doodle poll for a catchup call to deal with ballot resolutions - please standby.
Planning for two one hour ballot resolution calls for MEDS WG via doodle poll https://doodle.com/poll/iu46rbia5np3tgg4

Special Ballot Resolution Call: Thursday 14th Feb 1pm-3pm AEDT
Please attend as you are available over the 2 hour session.

Next meeting regular meeting 20 Feb 2019 Wednesday 1-2pm Eastern Daylight Savings Time (Every 2 Weeks)

Join from PC, Mac, Linux, iOS or Android: https://zoom.us/j/8838248492

or Phone: +61 (0) 2 8015 2088, Meeting ID: 883 824 8492

International numbers available: https://zoom.us/zoomconference?m=tiJBLgpQ1Jwgz8W6fYSFjBfO0TXzS_yE
